name: Tigras
description:
Controls:

  • q - Northwest
  • w - North
  • e - Northeast
  • a - Southwest
  • s - South
  • d - Southeast
  • [space] - Wait
  • 0 - Ability 1
  • 1 - Ability 2
  • c - Cycle targets
  • b - Skill book
  • ctrl+r - Restart

This is my entry for 7DRL 2021.  It is far from complete and hardly much of a game.  Right now you can walk around in the dark and kill some crabs.  Wee.  I started the challenge with nothing more than an engine.  No RL experience or libraries.  I wanted to see how far I could get.  This is nowhere near where I expected to be, but I'm out of time so here we are.  Enjoy.  I may develop it more afterwards.
